section.title: Operations Bridge Integration
section.para: The &kw-hos-phrase; monitoring solution (&o_monitor;Monasca) can easily be integrated with your existing monitoring tools. This page describes how to integrate &productname; Monasca with Operations Bridge using the Operations Bridge Connector. This will simplify monitoring and managing events and topology information.
The integration provides the following functionality:

listitem.para: Forwarding of &productname; Monasca alerts and topology to Operations Bridge for event correlation
Customization of forwarded events and topology
